orego.book

Class JosekiBook

  • java.lang.Object
    • orego.book.JosekiBook
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, OpeningBook

    public class JosekiBook
extends Object
implements OpeningBook, Serializable
    Suggests a joseki move (in the same corner as the last move if possible). In empty corners, always suggests a 4-4 point.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Board createJosekiBoard(Board board, int corner)
      Returns a board like board, but with all stones not in corner removed.
      int nextMove(Board board)
      Returns the next move in the opening book or NO_POINT if the book has been exhausted.
